thread.title: The Pride Flag Waves at the Olympics for Adam Rippon

author: Ben Cohen
title: The Pride Flag Waves at the Olympics for Adam Rippon
text:
GANGNEUNG, South Korea—Ian Rodriguez realized not long before the Pyeongchang Games that he would be in Asia with his husband during the Olympics. “Let’s go,” he said. Rodriguez bought tickets, changed his travel plans and went on Amazon to buy something he wanted to pack for his last-minute trip: a gay Pride flag with stars and rainbow stripes.
Rodriguez, a 35-year-old X-ray technician from Las Vegas, brought that flag to the men’s figure-skating competition on Friday morning here and unfurled it to celebrate after the short...
